screencasts.title: Always Ready-To-Code
screencasts.description: How to get a full dev environment in your browser with the click of a button and be immediately ready-to-code.

screencasts.title: Personalize Your Workspace
screencasts.description: How to customize and configure Gitpod for your personal needs and those of your team.

screencasts.title: Fully Automate Your Dev Setup
screencasts.description: Understanding the automation benefits that arise from the concept of dev-environment-as-code.

screencasts.title: Continuously Prebuild Your Project
screencasts.description: How to make Gitpod load in a blink by prebuilding your project ahead-of-time, continuously.

screencasts.title: Fresh Dev Environments For Each New Task
screencasts.description: Discover ephemeral/disposable workspaces and start fresh for each new task with just a single click. Pure magic!

screencasts.title: Collaborating with your team
screencasts.description: How to collaborate effectively with Gitpod's Shared Workspaces and Snapshots.
